Description: The Guild Starfire V Semi-Hollowbody Electric Guitar is a deluxe double cutaway loaded with features that give a fully expressive voice to your individual playing style. The classic Guild Starfire V is a semi-hollow beauty with a graceful 16-3/8 in. thinline body and twin Guild LB-1 “Little Bucker” pickups that make it an outstanding choice with an authentic Guild voice perfect for rock, blues, roots and more. The Starfire V’s all-mahogany body features an arched top and back, with dual f holes, elegant ivory white body binding, black/white purfling and center-block construction. Other premium features include bound three-piece mahogany/maple/mahogany neck with vintage-style “soft U” profile, 22-fret rosewood fingerboard with 9-1/2 in. radius and pearloid block inlays, three-way pickup selector switch, individual volume and tone controls for each pickup and master volume, tune-o-matic bridge with rosewood base, Guild vibrato tailpiece, Grover Sta-Tite tuning machines, nickel hardware and a gorgeous White finish. Body Body shape: Double cutaway Body type: Semi-hollow or chambered body Body material: Laminated Top wood: Mahogany Body wood: Mahogany Body finish: Gloss Orientation: Right handed Neck Neck shape: Vintage soft U Neck wood: 3-piece with mahogany Maple Joint: Set-in Scale length: 24.75 in. Truss rod: Standard Neck finish: Gloss Fretboard Material: Rosewood Radius: 9.5 in. Fret size: Medium jumbo Number of frets: 22 Inlays: Pearl block Nut width: 1.69 in. (43 mm) Pickups Configuration: HH Neck: LB-1 Bridge: LB-1 Brand: Guild Active or passive pickups: Passive Series or parallel: Series Controls Control layout: Volume 1, volume 2, tone 1, tone 2 Pickup switch: 3-way Hardware Bridge type: Tremolo/Vibrato Bridge design: Tune-o-matic Tailpiece: Guild vibrato Tuning machines: Grover Sta-Tite Color: Nickel Shipping Policy: We ship Fedex or USPS in the continental USA free. Alaska, Hawaii and US territories have a $40.00 charge. International shipping is by USPS Priority Mail International. International buyers pay all costs involved in shipping and import including all transport costs, duties, fees, taxes or other costs. Return Policy: 30 days, buyer pays all return shipping costs.
Title: Guild Starfire V White Semi-Hollowbody Electric Guitar w/Case
ConditionDescription: This guitar is setup and ready to play, everything works. It sounds and plays great. It has finish checking around the neck joint and on the top, as shown, as well as surface marks from handling. The action is below 3/32 at the 12th fret and the truss rod is active.
